DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , cross-over design . Subjects randomized one two intervention two separate study day , 1 week apart .
DOC.brief_title: Glycemic Response Two Enteral Formulas Persons With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Age 2075 yr Type 2 diabetes control diet diet oral agent , exception sulfonylurea glimepiride ( Amaryl ) , glipizide , Glucotrol/GlucotrolXL ) glyburide ( DiaBeta , Micronase , ( Glynase Prestabs ) ; meglitinides reaglinide ( Prandin ) nateglinide ( Starlix ) ; alphaglucosidase inhibitor acarbose ( Precose ) miglitol ( Glyset ) Hemoglobin A1C le 9.0 % Fasting blood glucose le 180 mg Abnormal thyroid function Creatinine > 2.0 mg/dL Potassium < 3.5 mEq/L Gastrointestinal disease : ulcer , gastritis , diarrhea , gastroparesis , vomit History bypass surgery , midface trauma , esophageal varix , coagulation abnormality Patients currently anticoagulant medication Currently unstable diabetes treatment cancer , heart disease , renal disease Unable give inform consent follow instruction Current insulin therapy insulin therapy within past month Patient pregnant Allergies milk , fish oil component test product Patient Investigators assessment expect comply treatment Currently participate participate another clinical trial .
